title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Antoine Griezmann, Mesut Ozil and Moussa Marega
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Monday, January 8.
content: Antoine Griezmann will demand £400,000-a-week to snub Barcelona and join Manchester United, say The Sun. Griezmann's current £177m release clause will be reduced to £88.6m in the summer.United have been given a free run to sign Alex Sandro after Chelsea pulled out of the race for the Juventus defender, according to The Sun.The 26-year-old Brazilian has been at Juventus since 2015, and has previously been heavily linked with a move to the Premier League.United boss Jose Mourinho is being linked again with a January move with Mesut Ozil, according to the Daily Mirror.Ozil is out of contract at the end of the season and reports suggest Arsenal could be willing to let him go in January for £35million.United and Chelsea have launched an enquiry for Porto striker Moussa Marega, according to The Metro.The Mali striker, 26, has 14 goals and two assists in 16 Primeira Liga appearances this term.Young United striker James Wilson could move to Championship side Sheffield United on loan, according to the Daily Mail. Wilson, 22, hasn't played a first-team game since suffering an anterior cruciate knee ligament injury on loan at Derby 16 months ago.
